sentences.en: The car failed to stop at an army checkpoint.
sentences.cn: 那辆车未能在一个军队检查站停下。

sentences.en: The checkpoint was abandoned as militarily indefensible.
sentences.cn: 检查站因为军事上无法防御而被舍弃。

sentences.en: For twenty-nine years, Checkpoint Charlie embodied the Cold War.
sentences.cn: 29年来，查理检查站具体象征了冷战。
